subject: High-Impact Drop - BLD-Sonic 5 Damage
body:
Dear BreezeLite Team,

I'm writing about my BLD-Sonic 5 hairdryer that I purchased on May 20, 2026.

Accidentally dropped the hairdryer from about 4 feet onto a tile bathroom floor. The casing is cracked and the ionic function is no longer working. The motor still runs, but the airflow seems restricted.

I understand this was an accident on my part, but wanted to check if there's any coverage or what repair options might be available.

I have the receipt and photos of the damage.

Thanks,
David Chen
david.chen@email.com
